title: Eco-Luxury Family House with Modern Amenities in Historic Stare Miasto, Zamosc
description: Discover this modern four-bedroom, three-bathroom house nestled in Zamosc’s renowned Stare Miasto district. Spanning 197 sqm, it artfully balances spacious comfort with energy-efficient sensibility. Large windows flood the airy interiors with natural light, while contemporary finishes blend seamlessly with eco-conscious solutions. Enjoy tranquil lounging spaces, ideal for family life and sophisticated entertainment.
neighborhood_description: Set amidst the UNESCO World Heritage beauty of Stare Miasto, the house offers blissful proximity to picturesque parks, historic squares, and vibrant cafes. The neighborhood features a uniquely quiet, safe atmosphere, with local playgrounds and leafy promenades creating a relaxed, community-centered pace of life. Well-served by reliable public transport and quick highway access, you’re seamlessly connected to all of Zamosc and beyond.
lifestyle_benefits: calm and privacy in an exclusive area
direct access to historic center and leisure
target_buyer: Ideal for luxury-seeking families or professionals who value modern sustainability, want premium amenities, and appreciate historic charm combined with peaceful surroundings.
market_positioning: Positioned as a rare blend of historic location and contemporary eco-luxury, this home is an exceptional option in Zamosc for high-end buyers seeking comfort, high security, and sustainable advantages, within a serene UNESCO neighborhood.
